1286860.name: Fraggin Halls VR
1286860.description:
A Fast Pace Virtual Reality shooter developed on HTC Vive. The Game is inspired by the ever present close quarters hallway shootouts that exist in virtually every Sci-Fi movie and TV series.

Features:

-Arcade style fast paced heart pounding gameplay
-Team and Player vs Enemy team Sandbox Arena Gameplay
-Choose Player Team, Choose Enemy Team, Choose Arena and Fight!
-6 Sandbox Arena style maps, 4 Survival Scenario Style maps, 1 Practice Range Map
-5 Player/Enemy/Team Races, 30+ Player Weapons, to choose from with much more to come.
-Smooth Interface, easy to jump right in and play without endless instructions to learn.
-Advanced and often Hilarious Ragdoll and Environmental physics.
-Detailed Dynamic Play Environments
-Per Match Scoring system.
-Minigame Mode Map - Sniper Cornhole
-Saved Scoring / Highscores for Survival and Minigame modes

Upcoming Soon Features:
-More Sandbox Maps and Scenario Maps
-More Minigame Mode Maps
-Enhancement of current weapons VFX and SFX
-Many More Weapons
-More Playable Races with Unique Weapons Sets
-More VFX and SFX for existing maps.
-Steam Achievements
-Stats/Leaderboards.
1286860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
